dialogue.text: Quick!  Let's get out of here while she's distracted!
Yukari then opens up a gap as the three rush through the gap.  However,  GF takes a moment to look behind her and watches Junko writher in rage and sorrow.
MY SON!!!!  WHY!!!!  WHY CAN'T THESE FOOLS LEARN THAT LOVE CREATES MONSTERS LIKE ME!!!
Can love really do that to someone?  Is...  is the love I have for Boyfriend too much?  No...  it isn't.  He's my everything,  but I can survive without him.
We may depend on each other,  but we're both independent in our own rights.  I will continue loving Boyfriend with all my heart.
Girlfriend leaves through the gap,  which closes immediately,  leaving Junko behind in her misery and self-pity.
